title: The single most tilting thing you can see in all of LoL

replies.body:
Any time I get some cocky loser that bans nothing and then feeds their ass off to their laner I like to say "Maybe you should have banned them?"

Too much cancer in the game to waste a ban slot on nothing.

faker never bans anything

is he a cocky loser

> [{quoted}](name=LPelican ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ApnEZUk9,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2019-08-11T01:40:54.372+0000)
>
> faker never bans anything
> 
> is he a cocky loser

Faker is really good at the game, most League players are not and after champ select they usually complain when they're getting destroyed by a champ they don't understand when they could've banned them.

> [{quoted}](name=LPelican ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ApnEZUk9,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2019-08-11T01:40:54.372+0000)
>
> faker never bans anything
> 
> is he a cocky loser

No.
He's a cocky winner.

> [{quoted}](name=LPelican ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ApnEZUk9,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2019-08-11T01:40:54.372+0000)
>
> faker never bans anything
> 
> is he a cocky loser

Lmao IKR. I mean he's good but his plays are so overrated. I see people ejaculating whenever they see his play. "Faker Yasuo Montage" is just him missing 200.000 Qs and then hitting one tornado and ulting 2 people and killing them, that's what they call outplay. Also, i've seen a reddit post where he literally flash ulted as Neeko into 4 people and stunned then, redditors praised him like he was a god lmao. Even a silver player that plays Neeko for the second time could've done that. Ugly nolifers are licking even uglier nolifer's ass, as usual.
Blame the players, not the champions.

I saw this today.

https://imgur.com/a/xZTnGju

> [{quoted}](name=14daysuspensionk,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ApnEZUk9,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-08-10T22:31:18.427+0000)
>
> I saw this today.
> 
> https://imgur.com/a/xZTnGju

gigayikes
No the worst is when someone bans a champ and then says "Someone ban X" like??? you had a ban, use it bruh!
And you have a problem with this how? There are over 20 champions now that need banned 24/7 because of how ridiculous this game is managed..
I'm not gonna use my ban just because this guy didn't want to ban Zed, he's hoping someone else will. No thanks, I'd rather ban Yasuo or Urgot. Maybe he should have banned Zed instead of Lee Sin

And that's perfectly fine? What if there was someone about to ban "None" and instead decide to ban that champ?

Coordination is perfectly fine.
Seems like a lot of entitlement to me to demand someone use their ban for the champ you didn't want to ban.

On the other hand, someone banning nothing instead of offering it to an ally is showing an extreme disdain for your teammates.

Besides, as an easily targeted ADC, I would prefer to knock out both Pyke and Nautilus, especially if either is free.

He did.

Theres too much BS in the game in every role for one ban per role to clear it all.

Theres nothing wrong with asking. Getting pissed when they don't get what they asked for is.
This is why i want riot to just remove bans altogether. People complain about literally nothing instead of just learning how to play the game.
You're trying too hard now

Yeah cause u can 100% counter an assasin with a reset cdr ult that that has cc and invisibility that also gives extra gold for their teamates. *cough*{{champion:555}} *cough*. OR A FUCKING ROOT THAT LAST 5 MILLIONS YEARS{{champion:518}} {{champion:25}}

> [{quoted}](name=MrCakeThe1st,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ApnEZUk9,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-08-10T21:40:15.226+0000)
>
> Yeah cause u can 100% counter an assasin with a reset cdr ult that that has cc and invisibility that also gives extra gold for their teamates. *cough*{{champion:555}} *cough*. OR A FUCKING ROOT THAT LAST 5 MILLIONS YEARS{{champion:518}} {{champion:25}}

Enchanters beat assassins (more specifically, defensive enchanters). Janna, lulu, soraka, nami etc. beat pyke as long as you play safe.

Neeko again doesnt like defensive enchanters, primarily janna (lets be real, most "op" engage champs are hard countered by janna. Also makes me sad i cant play janna for shit)

Morg can only shield 1 person. Her Q is a pain, yes, but morg is picked for her E. Blitz likely fucks her up now with his shieldbreak ult given he can just W walk up to her and she lacks mobility if you can bait Q, but other than that offensive supports without reliance on CC beat her pretty well.
I only get mad if they complain in game
And then enemy team picks Yasuo/Pyke
EXACTLY WHY THE FUCK WOULD THEY PUT THAT?

I don't normally ban anyone when I play normals.  Need to learn to play against everything because what you think is broken this week get surpassed by something else next week, but you have no experience against it.
this
Ahh... Took me some time to understand ðŸ˜…
Never ban in normals/flex. I want to learn how to play against my most unliked champions. Because Riot releases more and more broken champs. One day your most hated champ can no longer be the one

I don't ban anything in normals because there's too many champs I don't like to ban just one of them, so I rather not deprive anyone of the champ they want to play. The actual most tilting thing in League is when you log in to play something for fun and it gets banned. Might as well learn the game and git gud instead of trying to crutch on bans in non-ranked gameplay.

Hm. I used to be annoyed by this too, but then I realised that sometimes THIS FUCKING CLIENT lags and I cannot select a champion to ban cause the times runs out too quickly. And then it locks this ^ in.

Since then I am more respectful and tolerant to ppl who lock this ^ in.

Honestly, I have never understood the problem. I stopped banning champions because I thought I was limiting myself to the champions I could face. I wanted to learn, and get better at fighting other champions, not because I was cocky.

However, I then started to pick champions again because people either got pissed at me in game or, straight up, left in the picking phase because of it. 

Now I left the game so I do not have to worry about that anymore.

Have fun.

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
*Proceeds to ban none like always*
I always ban none, do you hate me?
